mapper.select: select mno,cno,tbl_cart.pno,tbl_product.pMainCategory,tbl_product.pSubCategory, tbl_product.pName,tbl_product.pPrice,tbl_product.pImage from tbl_cart left outer join tbl_product on tbl_cart.pno = tbl_product.pno where tbl_cart.pno=#{pno} order by tbl_cart.cno
